Package org.xchain.framework.jsl

Provides the classes that build dynamic commands for the jsl namespace.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSaxTemplateHandler
    This handler takes a sax event stream and creates command classes that will render non-chain elements into chains that write the elements as sax events.
    SaxTemplateHandler  
    SourceResult  
    TemplateCompiler  
    TemplateCompiler.WrappedResourceReader  
    TemplateSourceBuilder
    A utility class to build jsl template command classes.
    TemplateSourceBuilder.Context
    The context for a sax template command.
    TemplateSourceBuilder.VirtualChainContext
    The context for a virtual chain method.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractSaxTemplateHandler.ElementType
    The different element types the elements are grouped into.
    SaxTemplateHandler.CharacterTarget  
    TemplateSourceBuilder.BodyMode  

Package org.xchain.framework.jsl Description

Provides the classes that build dynamic commands for the jsl namespace.
